title: Climate Change Awareness March
description: Join us for a march through the city to raise awareness about climate change and its impact on our environment.

title: Tree Planting Day
description: Participate in our tree planting event to help restore our forests and combat climate change.

title: Renewable Energy Workshop
description: Attend our workshop to learn about renewable energy sources and how they can help reduce carbon emissions.

title: Beach Clean-Up
description: Join our community beach clean-up event to help remove plastic waste and protect marine life.
